itemDisplayName: Highly Available Ingress with layer 7 NVAs
description: This sample template will deploy example NVAs for Ingress in a HA configuration.
summary: This sample template will deploy an Front-end Load Balancer in front of two simulated NVA VMs. The NVA VMs will forward requests to a Web-tier Load Balancer in front of two back-end web server VMs.
